thread.title: Actress Samantha's hotel bills under I-T lens | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Actress Samantha's hotel bills under I-T lens | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Actress Samantha's hotel bills under I-T lens | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 07.07 am Actress Samantha Recently when actress Samantha got raided by the I-T sleuths, it’s not just her home in Chennai that got raided. Word has it that the tax-man went knocking on the doors of the Park Hyatt hotel in Hyderabad, as the actress has a service apartment in the property. The tax-men were spotted questioning the hotel authorities on all of Samantha’s payments regarding her apartment.
Apparently, since the actress was not in town, they even cordoned off her suite and had it locked so that nobody could enter it. But things seemed to have been sorted out since she was spotted back in town for a mall opening and was staying at her usual address in Hyderabad.
